results.title: Poland: the will to be
results.creator_credit: Albert Waller and Emlen House Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “James Michener’s World”.
Documentary film, narrated by James Michener, which looks at the history of Poland since its “first birth”. Shows the gaining of independence after Versailles, the invasion by Germany in 1939 and the Russian intervention during the war. Finally concentrates on the social-political structure of modern Poland. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
results.description:
Episode of Series “James Michener’s World”.
Documentary film, narrated by James Michener, which looks at the history of Poland since its “first birth”. Finally concentrates on the social-political structure of modern Poland. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
description_for_label:

Documentary film, narrated by James Michener, which looks at the history of Poland since its “first birth”. Finally concentrates on the social-political structure of modern Poland. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.

results.title: Motor vehicle trades
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Deals with the trade of the panel beater, and also shows the work of the vehicle trimmer and the vehicle painter. Discusses apprenticeship details and training required.

results.title: Industrial design
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Discusses the part played by the industrial designer in bringing new designs onto the market, the various factors involved, and the type of training needed.

results.title: Aircraft maintenance
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Discusses general overhaul maintenance of aircraft, whether it be commercial, passer or light aircraft. Includes TAA, Qantas, East-West, Cessner airlines. Also talks about testing and checking procedures and what the engineer should be looking for; the role of the engineer and qualifications required for this career.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”
Discusses general overhaul maintenance of aircraft, whether it be commercial, passer or light aircraft. Includes TAA, Qantas, East-West, Cessner airlines. Also talks about testing and checking procedures and what the engineer should be looking for; the role of the engineer and qualifications required for this career.

results.title: Motor mechanic
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Designed to give the intending mechanic some idea of the specialised work involved in the career of a modern automotive mechanic. The technical training required is discussed.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

results.title: Management
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Illustrates what management is, using as an example, a well run household. A manager needs to ensure that all the activities of an organisation or business enterprise combine effectively. They have the ultimate responsibility for an entire organisation - its success or failure. Points out that most careers can lead to management but that school leavers can train in technical colleges, universities or sometimes within an industry.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Illustrates what management is, using as an example, a well run household. A manager needs to ensure that all the activities of an organisation or business enterprise combine effectively. Points out that most careers can lead to management but that school leavers can train in technical colleges, universities or sometimes within an industry.

results.title: Law
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the different responsibilities carried by the barrister and the solicitor. Discusses opportunities available in the practice of law, including services to business and commerce.
